summary:
Oppose digital IDs ‚Äì they break the law and lead to mass scale surveillance
Published: Dec 18, 2024

Starting next year, the UK government plans to introduce digital ID cards for the young people to prove their age when visiting pubs.  While officials claim this system will remain optional, it's part of a broader government initiative to move more state functions online so that people can prove their identity for everything from paying taxes to opening a bank account using the government-backed app.  This will be a step toward a society where every pub visit, purchase, and social interaction becomes a permanent digital record linked to a government-issued ID ‚Äì a step to normalizing mass surveillance at scale...
title: Oppose digital IDs ‚Äì they break the law and lead to mass scale surveillance
